div.p: A detailed description of the result or product of the Event.
An Event outcome may be sufficiently complex that a coded description is not adequate to document it.

This may be used to record all error and warning messages issued by a program involved in the Event or to record a pointer to an error log. If the Event was a validity check (e.g., profile conformance) any anomalies or quirks discovered would be recorded here. All subunits of this semantic unit are optional. At least one subunit (i.e. eventOutcomeDetailNote and/or eventOutcomeDetailExtension) must be present if this container is included.
